# RequestDescriptor.detectFaceLandmarksRequest(_:)

**Case**

A descriptor that describes a detect face landmarks request.

## Declaration

```swift
case detectFaceLandmarksRequest(DetectFaceLandmarksRequest.Revision)
```

## Getting the face and body detection descriptor

- **RequestDescriptor.detectFaceCaptureQualityRequest(_:)**: A descriptor that describes a detect face capture quality request.
- **RequestDescriptor.detectFaceRectanglesRequest(_:)**: A descriptor that describes a detect face rectangles request.
- **RequestDescriptor.detectHumanRectanglesRequest(_:)**: A descriptor that describes a detect human rectangles request.
